Control Name: SESSION AUTHENTICITY | INVALIDATE SESSION IDENTIFIERS AT LOGOUT
Control Statement: The information system invalidates session identifiers upon user logout or other session termination.Supplemental Guidance:  This control enhancement curtails the ability of adversaries from capturing and continuing to employ previously valid session IDs.
